reviews.text: Extremely unreliable station. Today overground departure was 15 min late and even though there were 4 trains standing idle there was no drivers to run them. Absolutely ridicilous and a waste of money

Me and my girlfriend got to the platform asked the train driver to hang on a min and open the doors he said ok will do closed his door and started the train! We had to then wait another 45 mins for the next one 🙄
Good station to actually trainspot 10/10 would do again

We asked johnathan for some information tonight.. He was extremely helpful and was so kind. He kept us right and provided us with the best information... What a fantastic start to our trip. Thanks watford railway station and a big thanks to johnathan.
A big station , but platforms and places around excellent .
